short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Brings a fresh and serene atmosphere to your browser.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
A stunning image of a turquoise river flowing through rocky cliffs, surrounded by lush green forests. The photo captures the majestic beauty and tranquility of nature, offering a calming visual experience every time you open a new tab. Feel the power of the rushing water and the refreshing green hues of the wilderness, helping to recharge your mind and boost your productivity.

- Beautiful background.
- Quick access to frequently visited sites.
- Customizable search bar and shortcuts.
- Real-time weather display and clock.
